datasetControl.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? Doing so will delete all cooresponding tags
datasetControl.deleteMultipleEntries: Are you sure you want to delete selected entries? All cooresponding tags will be deleted
datasetControl.downloadDescription: Would you like to download this dataset? All entries will be downloaded. Once complete, the downloaded results will be available in the download center
datasetControl.downloadFailed: Could not download dataset, please reach out to administrator
datasetControl.downloadStartedSuccess: Download has started, go to download center to get artifacts when complete

newProject.projectExists: A project with this name already exists

newStudy.completed: All steps completed - your new study is created
newStudy.disableSameUserTagging: Disable users tagging entries they recorded
newStudy.noDatasets: No datasets available, create a dataset and grant the project access under Datasets > Project Access
newStudy.tagsDescription: Number of times each entry needs to be tagged (default 1)

projectControl.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this project? Doing so will delete all contained studies and tags

studyControl.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this study? Doing so will delete all contained tags

studyDownload.downloadDescription: Would you like to download this study? The tag data, any recorded videos, and the original entries will be download, this may take a while, downloads will appear in the study download page when complete
studyDownload.downloadFailed: Could not download study data, please reach out to your administrator
studyDownload.downloadStartedSuccess: Download has started, the download will be available under the study download page

errors.entryQuery: Failed to get entries for the dataset

errors.projectAdminUpdate: Could not update the user's permssions
errors.projectCreate: Could not create the project, please try again
errors.projectDelete: An issue took place deleting the project
errors.studyCreate: Failed to create the new study
errors.studyDelete: Failed to delete the target study

errors.tagComplete: Se ha producido un error. Por favor, envíe su respuesta de nuevo
